thread.section_title: Microfiber Wholesale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Microfiber Wholesale | www.microfiberwholesale.com
thread.title: R. M., Seattle WA
thread.title_full: Microfiber Wholesale reviewed by R. M., Seattle WA

author: R. M., Seattle WA
title: R. M., Seattle WA
text: I've placed several orders. Product quality is exceptional, packages secure and thoughtful, customer service for questions or concerns always cheerful, fast and dedicated. This is a great company for the sweet spot of price vs. quality, I'd probably put up with it if the customer service was lacking, but it's not, it's some of the best I've ever experienced. Highly recommended. I'm further impressed because I am a small entrepreneur, not buying tens of thousands of dollars. I haven't spent more than $500 with this company yet, and they still treat me like their company cares about my business.
